Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart

Variations on Come un’agnello, KV 460/454a

1784 · KV1,2 460 · KV3,6 454a

[IMSLP]

The theme is from Giuseppe Sarti’s opera Fra i due litiganti. There exist two versions of the variations, one incomplete with two variations and one with eight variations. The version with eight variations is possibly spurious.

Recommended editions

  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IX/26 · BA 4525-01 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Kurt von Fischer [version with two variations]
  • Neue Mozart-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · X/29/2 · BA 4612-01 · Werke zweifelhafter Echtheit / Band 2: Bläser-Divertimenti, Klavier-Violinsonaten, Klaviermusik · ed. Franz Giegling / Wolfgang Plath / Wolfgang Rehm [version with eight variations and version in G major with six variations]
  • Bärenreiter · BA 5746 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Kurt von Fischer [version with two variations]
  • Henle · HN 116 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Ewald Zimmermann [version with two variations and version with eight variations]
  • Henle · HN 117 · Variationen für Klavier · ed. Ewald Zimmermann [version with two variations and version with eight variations]
  • Könemann · K 112 · Variationen · ed. István Máriássy [version with two variations]

Version with two variations

These variations are incomplete.

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2

Version with eight variations

These variations are possibly spurious.

Duration: 12' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5
